title.rendered: Verification of Restaurant Staff is easy & fast now. It is online.

content.rendered:
Conducting a diligent Background Verification of Restaurant Staff is quite challenging.

So how do you verify their credentials?

Try the Background Verification Services of Helpers Near Me and solve your problem today.

Have you ever wondered how to go about getting your Restaurant Staff’s credentials verified?

So whether:

  • You have a chain of restaurants, or
  • If you are running just one restaurant setup, or
  • You have a small hotel & restaurant with about 20-40 staff

What you always put at risk is your guests’ valuables.

In reality, not every staff’s credential is questionable. However, professionally verifying their credentials always ensures a secured system is in place.

This kind of professional background verification of your restaurant staff also ensures the safety of your Guests’ valuables while they are at your restaurant.

So, how do you go about conducting the background verification of your Restaurant Staff?

How do you ensure their credentials gets verified in an absolute professional way?

Here are some of the options for you:

  1. Get your Restaurant Staff’s credentials verified at the nearest local police station, or
  2. Get his credentials verified online, in an absolute professional way at Helpers Near Me.

Option 1 (Recommended): Getting a Police Verification of Restaurant Staffs done at the local police station

Although this is the usual choice that occurs first to everyone’s mind, however, accomplishing it for a large or even small number of restaurant staff is not entirely very convenient.

Here are some of the steps involved in Police Verification of Restaurant Staff:

  1. Get a Police Verification form from the local police station (you can even get it online in some cases)
  2. Fill the form for the staff with their full details
  3. Submit the duly filled police verification form at the nearest local police station
  4. At times, if required, even visit the local police station with each of your restaurant staff
  5. Revisit the police station, if some of the documents are not as per the requirements
  6. Picking the stamped copy of the Police Verification Form after a few days

In your busy working days, sometimes this seems like a big task.

While you can still send someone from your office to get the necessary paperwork done, yet, this seems more like a task.

And therefore, most often, you never get into it. It just gets ignored in the day-to-day work.

At a national level, it is estimated that only about 10-20% of companies go through the diligent exercise of conducting the Background Verification of Restaurant Staff.

And the rest of the companies take a photocopy of the Restaurant Staff’s ID and rely majorly on the reference who referred the Restaurant Staff.

While taking a copy of ID is easy, but not a safe option.

It is even riskier when you actually loose any of your guests’ valuables.

Option 2 (Easy & Convenient): Verifying the background of your Restaurant Staff through Helpers Near Me

To help your company with Professional Background Verification of Restaurant Staff here’s a new initiative from Helpers Near Me.

It is easy, convenient and takes just about 5 minutes for you to place a Verification request.

Plus, it is also easy to pocket – just Rs.199/- per Restaurant Staff, for the basic option.

And imagine getting a detailed Professional Background Verification Report of your Restaurant Staff being emailed to you.

The report gets emailed directly to your inbox, within 10-15 Working days.

Isn’t this as convenient as it could get?

This Professional Background Verification Report carries the following:

  1. A professional check on Restaurant Staff’s ID – Aadhar ID, Driving License of his Voter ID
  2. A detailed check on Restaurant Staff’s Criminal/Court Records, if any, in District Courts located in many parts of India, and
  3. If you have opted for this, the report also carries a neighborhood check of his Present or Permanent Address, whether it is in a city like Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai or Kolkata, or a village in many parts of India

This kind of detailed & Professional Background Verification of Restaurant Staff is something that most of us haven’t seen or heard of so far.

But yes, it is possible.

How to place your request for Background Verification of your Restaurant Staff?

Here are 3 quick online steps that you need to do for placing a request for Background Verification of your Restaurant Staff. And all of it can be done in just 5 minutes, that too directly through our mobile phone.

  1. Step 1: Visit the Background Verification page at Helpers Near Me or click here
  2. Step 2: Fill your Staff’s essential details, if you have if you have it ready with you (Name, Phone, Govt. ID number & Address). Or you can also choose to fill in only your details (Again just your Name, Phone & Email)
  3. Step 3: Make a payment of just Rs.199/- through the secure payment gateway of ‘Helpers near me’ (Either through your Paytm Account or by your Credit/Debit Card or Net Banking).

That’s all.

Once you have initiated your Background Verification request for your Restaurant Staff, you would get a formal report within 7-10 working days of your request, at your email address.

For any additional information required during the process, the Helpers Near Me team gets in touch with you.

Here’s how the Background Verification conducted at Helpers Near Me

The partner company of Helpers Near Me, BetterPlace, conducts the Background Verification of Restaurant Staff.

The partner company is integrated with UIDAI, NSDL, and reliable Government District portals that detail Criminal Cases. These Criminal/Court Records are verified by the company’s team of legal experts.

The physical Address Verification is done via a network of app-based verifiers across the country.

With such a kind of Professional Background Verification, you get transparency into the Restaurant Staff’s Identity, Antecedents, and Character.

This kind of verification allows you to make an informed decision on the person you have already hired or are about to hire.

More so, it will enable you to ensure your Customers’ valuable items are safe & secure.

With this new Online Background Verification initiative of Helpers Near Me, you have an option to be 100% sure of the background of your Restaurant Staff.

If you are still relying on your Restaurant Staff’s ID copy, we suggest you verify your staff today!
